sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_1129
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ./ComponentDesign.markdown line 186 Requirement is verified here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZV/Evo/test/swut/ZV_Integration.c.test line 75 Requirement is verified here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZV/Evo/test/swut/ZV_Integration.c.test line 81 Requirement is verified here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZV/Evo/test/swut/ZV_Integration.c.test line 86 Requirement is verified here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZV/Evo/test/swut/ZV_Integration.c.test line 91 NVM block shall be configured as below, allowing CDL to store:
- the CDL-state(port NV_ZV_Zustand, 7 bytes) - the CDLcrash-state(port NV_ZV_Crash, 1 byte) - the CDL-history (port NV_ZV_Historie, 141 bytes) - the CDL-HistorieEntr (port NV_ZV_HistorieEntr, 161 bytes) - the CDL-HistorieErweitert (port NV_ZV_HistorieErweitert, 19 bytes) - the CDL Monitor (port NV_ZV_Monitor, 20 bytes)
Note1: Values for the ports are different than stated in the STR requirement, actual values and presented in this SW requirement re taken from SST as agreed with VW (GATEWAY-5590) Note2: The SW-component CDL requires three blocks in the non-volatile memory, according to the definition in the ARXML-file
ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_1129 _ObjectType: Non Functional Requirement ASIL: QM
